review: I was having extreme pain in my right foot and was unable to walk properly. Dr neeraj Shrivastav treated me for 1 week ie 2 consultations and I was able to stand back on my feet and walk properly again. he is very polite, helpful in case you need some details about blood samples or anything,he is very much open in answering these without any hesitation. Treats patients with utmost care and respect. He is soft spoken and a real gentleman. If you need a consultation,visit him with no doubt in your mind.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was very helpful he had let me know the causes rehab program any many more  i will recommend dr. Neeraj Srivasatava
